T08D4146:240a-1: a'a rya nan di mi tra aa ba d'a na n'a ma /
T08D4146:240a-3: 'phags pa dga' ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rtogs pa brjod pa zhes bya ba /
T08D4146:240a-4: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dga' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T08D4146:240a-6: bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgyad brgya lon par gyur pa na /
T08D4146:240a-7: de'i tshe de'i dus na yul shi bi ka zhes
T08D4146:240a-8: bya ba na grong khyer byin gyis brlabs pa zhes
T08D4146:240a-10: de na rgyal po rigs pa'i sde zhes bya ba gnas so //
T08D4146:240a-11: de'i tshe rgyal po rigs pa'i sde'i yul na dge
T08D4146:240a-12: slong dga' ba'i bshes gnyen zhes bya ba rnam par
T08D4146:240a-13: thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan ba mngon par shes
T08D4146:240a-17: dpag tshad brgya stong phrag du ma na gnas pa'i
T08D4146:240a-18: sems can rnams las grog mo dang ku ta'i sems
T08D4146:240a-19: kyi spyod pa shes pa zhig gnas te /
T08D4146:240a-20: de yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus kyi
T08D4146:240a-21: tshe dge slong gi dge 'dun 'dus pa rnams kyis
T08D4146:240a-22: 'di skad du / khyod lta bu mya ngan las
T08D4146:240a-23: 'das na sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa nub par mi
T08D4146:240b-0: 'gyur ram @240b zhes smras pa dang des de dag
T08D4146:240b-1: 'di skad du / la smras pa / nub par mi 'gyur te /
T08D4146:240b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan nas bshad do //
T08D4146:240b-3: 'di ltar yang dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas dris pa /
T08D4146:240b-4: gnas brtan yun ji srid cig gi bar du bcom
T08D4146:240b-5: ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i dam pa'i chos gnas par
T08D4146:240b-7: bzhin bzangs dag dogs pa med kyis mya ngan dang smre sngags ma 'don cig //
T08D4146:240b-9: bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i
T08D4146:240b-10: dus kyi tshe gnas brtan chen po bcu drug gi
T08D4146:240b-11: lag tu dam pa'i chos gtad par gyur te /
T08D4146:240b-12: sbyin bdag dang sbyin pa po'i sbyin pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T08D4146:240b-13: de skad ces smras pa dang /
T08D4146:240b-14: gnas brtan dga' ba'i bshes gnyen la dge slong rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras so //
T08D4146:240b-15: gnas brtan bdag cag gis gnas brtan de dag gi mtshan yang mi 'tshal lo //
T08D4146:240b-17: tshe dang ldan ba dag gnas brtan dang po'i mtshan ni bar dva dza bsod snyoms len zhes bya'o //
T08D4146:240b-18: gnas brtan gnyis pa'i mtshan ni gser be'u zhes bya'o //
T08D4146:240b-19: gnas brtan gsum pa'i mtshan ni ba ra dva dza zhes bya'o //
T08D4146:240b-20: gnas brtan bzhi pa'i mtshan ni mi phyed pa zhes bya'o //
T08D4146:240b-21: gnas brtan lnga pa'i mtshan ni shing shun can zhes bya'o //
T08D4146:240b-22: gnas brtan drug pa'i mtshan ni bzang po zhes bya'o //
T08D4146:240b-23: gnas brtan bdun pa'i mtshan ni nag po zhes bya'o //
T08D4146:240b-24: gnas brtan brgyad pa'i mtshan ni bad sa'i bu zhes bya'o //
T08D4146:240b-25: gnas brtan dgu pa'i mtshan ni ba lang skyong zhes bya'o //
T08D4146:240b-26: gnas brtan bcu pa'i mtshan ni lam pa zhes bya'o //
T08D4146:240b-27: gnas brtan bcu gcig pa'i mtshan ni sgra gcan 'dzin zhes bya'o //
T08D4146:240b-28: gnas brtan bcu gnyis pa'i mtshan ni kru sde zhes bya'o //
T08D4146:240b-29: gnas brtan bcu gsum pa'i mtshan ni zur gyis shes zhes bya'o //
T08D4146:240b-30: gnas brtan bcu bzhi pa'i mtshan ni nags na gnas zhes bya'o //
T08D4146:240b-31: gnas brtan bco lnga ba'i mtshan ni mi pham pa zhes bya'o //
T08D4146:240b-32: gnas brtan bcu drug pa'i mtshan ni gtsug gi lam pa zhes bya'o //
T08D4146:240b-33: gnas brtan de dag ni rig pa gsum dang ldan ba sde snod gsum pa /
T08D4146:240b-34: khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba /
T08D4146:241a-1: kyis tshe byin gyis brlabs te bsrings nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bkas gnas pa yin no //
T08D4146:241a-2: sbyin pa po dang sbyin bdag rnams kyi sbyin pa yongs su dag par byed do //
T08D4146:241a-3: de skad ces smras pa dang /
T08D4146:241a-4: dge slong rnams kyis gnas brtan dga' ba'i bshes gnyen la 'di skad ces smras so //
T08D4146:241a-5: gnas brtan bdag cag gis gnas brtan de dag gang na bzhugs pa mi 'tshal lo //
T08D4146:241a-7: tshe dang ldan pa dag gnas brtan dang po ba
T08D4146:241a-8: ra dva dza bsod snyoms len ni 'khor dgra bcom
T08D4146:241a-9: pa stong dang lhan cig ba lang spyod kyi gling
T08D4146:241a-10: na gnas so // gnas brtan gser be'u zhes bya
T08D4146:241a-11: ba ni 'khor dgra bcom pa lnga stong dang lhan
T08D4146:241a-12: cig shar kyi lus 'phags po'i gling na gnas so
T08D4146:241a-13: na gnas so // // gnas brtan ba ra dva
T08D4146:241a-14: dza ni 'khor dgra bcom pa drug stong dang lhan
T08D4146:241a-15: cig byang phyogs kyi kha che'i yul na gnas so
T08D4146:241a-16: na gnas so // // // gnas brtan mi phyed
T08D4146:241a-17: pa ni 'khor dgra bcom pa bdun stong dang lhan
T08D4146:241a-18: cig 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas so //
T08D4146:241a-19: gnas brtan shing shun can ni 'khor dgra bcom pa
T08D4146:241a-20: drug stong dang han cig byang gi sgra mi snyan
T08D4146:241a-22: gnas brtan bzang po ni 'khor dgra bcom pa dgu stong dang lhan cig zangs gling na gnas so //
T08D4146:241a-23: gnas brtan nag po ni 'khor dgra bcom pa khri
T08D4146:241a-24: dang lhan cig sing ga la'i gling na gnas so
T08D4146:241a-25: // gnas brtan bad sa'i bu ni 'khor dgra bcom
T08D4146:241a-26: pa khri chig stong dang lhan cig pa na sa'i
T08D4146:241a-28: gnas brtan ba lang skyong ni 'khor dgra bcom pa
T08D4146:241a-29: brgyad stong dang lhan cig ri bo spos kyi dad
T08D4146:241a-31: gnas brtan lam pa ni 'khor dgra bcom pa stong
T08D4146:241a-32: phrag bcu gsum dang lhan cig lha'i gnas sum cu
T08D4146:241a-34: gnas brtan sgra gcan 'dzin ni 'khor dgra bcom pa
T08D4146:241a-35: stong dang lhan cig phri yang gu'i gling na gnas
T08D4146:241a-36: so // gnas brtan klu sde ni 'khor dgra bcom
T08D4146:241a-37: pa stong phrag bcu gnyis dang lhan cig ri bo
T08D4146:241a-39: gnas brtan zur gyis shes ni 'khor dgra bcom pa
T08D4146:241a-40: stong phrag gsum dang lhan cig ri bo ngos yangs
T08D4146:241a-41: na gnas so // gnas brtan nags na gnas ni
T08D4146:241b-0: 'khor dgra bcom pa @241b stong phrag bcu bzhi dang
T08D4146:241b-1: lhan cig lus 'phags kyi ri la gnas so //
T08D4146:241b-2: gnas brtan mi pham pa ni 'khor dgra bcom pa
T08D4146:241b-3: stong phrag bco lnga dang lhan cig rgyal po'i khab
T08D4146:241b-4: bya rgod phung po'i ri la gnas so //
T08D4146:241b-5: gnas brtan gtsug gi lam pa ni 'khor dgra bcom
T08D4146:241b-6: pa stong phrag drug cu dang lhan cig ri bo
T08D4146:241b-8: gnas brtan de dag gis ni mi shes pa'am /
T08D4146:241b-11: mngon sum du ma byas pa ni cung zad kyang med do //
T08D4146:241b-17: gang cung zad mi shes pa med do //
T08D4146:241b-18: de dag tu gnas brtan bcu drug po de dag
T08D4146:241b-19: la 'khor du ma dang bcas pa cha lugs gzhan
T08D4146:241b-20: dang gzhan gyis de dang der byon zhing gnas te
T08D4146:241b-21: / de ltar sbyin ba yongs su dag par byed do //
T08D4146:241b-22: ma 'ongs pa na mtshon gyi bskal pa byung ba
T08D4146:241b-23: 'das nas mi rnams dge ba bcu dang ldan bas
T08D4146:241b-25: lo brgyad cu thub pa na ston pa'i nyan thos
T08D4146:241b-26: de dag yang phyir la 'dzam bu'i gling du byon
T08D4146:241b-27: nas dam pa'i chos yang dag par ston par byed
T08D4146:241b-28: cing rab tu 'byin par byed do //
T08D4146:241b-29: ji srid skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo drug brgya
T08D4146:241b-30: par gyur pa de srid du bcom ldan 'das sh'akya
T08D4146:241b-31: thub pa'i bstan pa dam pa'i chos gnas par gyur
T08D4146:241b-32: te / mi rnams kyi tshe lo bdun brgya par
T08D4146:241b-33: gyur pa na nyan thos de dag gis gang sa'i
T08D4146:241b-34: steng 'di na bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i bstan
T08D4146:241b-35: pa'i tshogs ji snyed pa de dag gcig tu bsdus
T08D4146:241b-36: nas rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten gcig
T08D4146:241b-37: byas te kun nas bskor nas skyil mo krung bcas
T08D4146:241b-38: te 'dug nas 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das de
T08D4146:241b-39: bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
T08D4146:241b-40: pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa de la 'dud pas
T08D4146:241b-42: phyag byas nas phung po lhag ma med ba'i yongs
T08D4146:241b-43: su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su
T08D4146:241b-45: rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten de yang
T08D4146:241b-46: nub nas 'og gi gser kyi sa gzhi gang yin
T08D4146:242a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i bstan pa dam pa'i chos nub par @242a * //
T08D4146:242a-2: de nas de'i rjes la rang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //
T08D4146:242a-3: de nas mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri par
T08D4146:242a-4: gyur pa na de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa zhes
T08D4146:242a-6: de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling ni 'byor ba rgyas pa /
T08D4146:242a-9: mi dang skye bo mang pos yongs su gang zhing /
T08D4146:242a-10: bya gag 'phur ba tsam na grong khyer dang /
T08D4146:242a-15: rgyal po'i pho brang yod par 'gyur ro //
T08D4146:242a-16: lan cig sa bon btab pas lo bdun gyi bar du 'bras bu rnams skye bar 'gyur ro //
T08D4146:242a-17: de'i nyan thos 'dus pa yang gsum du 'gyur te /
T08D4146:242a-18: 'dus pa dang po la ni nyan thos 'dus pa
T08D4146:242a-19: bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug 'byung bar 'gyur
T08D4146:242a-20: ro // 'dus pa gnyis pa la ni nyan thos
T08D4146:242a-21: 'dus pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa bzhi 'byung
T08D4146:242a-22: ro // bar 'gyur ro // 'dus pa gsum pa
T08D4146:242a-23: la ni nyan thos bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa
T08D4146:242a-24: gnyis kyi 'dus pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ba
T08D4146:242a-25: ro // bar 'gyur ro // yin te / gang
T08D4146:242a-26: 'di dag ni sbyin pa po dang sbyin bdag yin
T08D4146:242a-27: ro // bar 'gyur ro // yin te / te
T08D4146:242a-28: / yang de dag gis gzhan du bcom ldan 'das
T08D4146:242a-29: sh'akya thub pa'i gsung rab la sangs rgyas la dge
T08D4146:242a-30: ba'i rtsa ba bsgrun zhing bya ba byas par gyur
T08D4146:242a-31: ro // bar 'gyur ro // yin te / te / pa yin te / 'di lta ste /
T08D4146:242a-32: gser gyi rang bzhin dang dngul gyi rang bzhin dang /
T08D4146:242a-35: rin po che'i rang bzhin dang /
T08D4146:242a-36: ra gan gyi dngos po dang /
T08D4146:242a-41: tsan dan gyi rang bzhin dang /
T08D4146:242a-42: aa ka ru'i rang bzhin dang /
T08D4146:242a-44: rva'i rang bzhin dang ba so'i rang bzhin dang /
T08D4146:242a-46: sna tshogs pa'i rang bzhin dang /
T08D4146:242a-47: rus pa'i rang bzhin dang sa las sku gzugs sam mchod rten bzhengs su gsol zhing /
T08D4146:242a-48: tha na sor mo tsam gyi sku'am mchod rten bzhengs
T08D4146:242a-49: su gsol bas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de
T08D4146:242a-50: dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
T08D4146:242a-51: dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
T08D4146:242a-52: byams pa'i gsung rab la mi'i 'thob pa rab tu
T08D4146:242a-53: thob nas / 'dus pa dang po la dang ba
T08D4146:242b-0: dang dang pa dang ldan @242b bas rab tu byung
T08D4146:242b-1: nas skra dang kha spu bregs te chos gos bgos
T08D4146:242b-2: nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste
T08D4146:242b-3: thob nas / / smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o //
T08D4146:242b-4: tshe dang ldan pa dag re zhig sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa yin no //
T08D4146:242b-5: yang gang dag snang ba chos kyi phung po brgyad
T08D4146:242b-6: khri po bcom ldan sh'akya thub pa'i chos kyi bdud
T08D4146:242b-7: rtsi la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur cing
T08D4146:242b-13: gang dag theg pa chen po'i mdo sde zab pa
T08D4146:242b-14: zab bar gyur pa stong pa nyid dang ldan pa
T08D4146:242b-16: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T08D4146:242b-17: dam pa'i chos padma dkar po dang /
T08D4146:242b-21: stong pa nyid kyi 'od mchog dang /
T08D4146:242b-22: phyag na rdo rje gsang ba la sogs pa dang sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T08D4146:242b-23: cho 'phrul chen bo'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T08D4146:242b-24: bsod nams thams cad la bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T08D4146:242b-25: 'phags pa zla ba sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T08D4146:242b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /
T08D4146:242b-27: gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T08D4146:242b-28: byang chub kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /
T08D4146:242b-30: sangs rgyas thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
T08D4146:242b-35: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po dang /
T08D4146:242b-42: legs pa'i mtshan gyis zhus pa dang /
T08D4146:242b-43: drag shul can gyis zhus pa dang /
T08D4146:242b-44: dra ba can gyis zhus pa dang /
T08D4146:242b-45: klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa dang /
T08D4146:242b-46: drang srong rgyas pas zhus pa dang /
T08D4146:242b-47: brgya byin gyis zhus pa dang /
T08D4146:242b-48: lag na rin chen gyis zhus pa dang /
T08D4146:242b-49: mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas zhus pa dang /
T08D4146:242b-50: dpa' bo nam mkhas zhus pa dang /
T08D4146:242b-51: bu mo 'od ldan mas zhus pa dang /
T08D4146:242b-52: bu mo rin chen ldan gyis zhus pa dang /
T08D4146:242b-53: bu mo gser gyi 'od mchog gis zhus pa dang /
T08D4146:243a-1: rgyal po 'char byed kyis zhus pa dang /
T08D4146:243a-2: dbang phyug chen pos zhus pa dang /
T08D4146:243a-3: rgyal po gzugs can snying pos zhus pa dang /
T08D4146:243a-4: dge ba bzang po gang gis zhus pa dang /
T08D4146:243a-5: lha'i bu mo legs pa'i mtshan gyis zhus pa dang /
T08D4146:243a-6: lha'i bu tsan dan gyis zhus pa dang /
T08D4146:243a-7: lha'i bu rang gi rgyan gyis zhus pa dang /
T08D4146:243a-8: lag bzangs kyis zhus pa dang /
T08D4146:243a-10: seng ge rnam par rol pas zhus pa dang /
T08D4146:243a-11: dpas byin gyis zhus pa dang /
T08D4146:243a-12: gtsug na rin chen gyis zhus pa dang /
T08D4146:243a-14: byang chub sems dpa'i zlos gar dang /
T08D4146:243a-15: stag rna'i rtogs pa brjod pa dang /
T08D4146:243a-16: lam rnam bar bshad pa dang /
T08D4146:243a-17: blo gros mi zad pas bstan pa dang /
T08D4146:243a-18: blo gros rgya mtshos bstan pa dang /
T08D4146:243a-19: dri ma med par grags pas bstan pa dang /
T08D4146:243a-22: sred med kyi bu'i 'gyur ba dang /
T08D4146:243a-32: 'od dpag med kyi bkod pa dang /
T08D4146:243a-33: bde ba can gyi bkod pa dang /
T08D4146:243a-34: dam pa'i chos kyi yon tan bkod pa dang /
T08D4146:243a-36: rnam dag me tog bsdus pa dang /
T08D4146:243a-37: 'jig rten dag pas bsdus pa dang /
T08D4146:243a-38: byang chub sems dpa' dag pas bsdus pa dang /
T08D4146:243a-39: thams cad sdegs las babs pa dang /
T08D4146:243a-40: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lha las babs pa dang /
T08D4146:243a-42: rin po che'i phung po dang /
T08D4146:243a-43: rin po che'i za ma tog dang /
T08D4146:243a-50: cod pan dra ba can dang /
T08D4146:243a-52: 'di dag la sogs pa bye ba phrag brgya ni theg pa chen po'i sde snod yin no //
T08D4146:243a-53: de bzhin du nyan thos kyi sde snod de /
T08D4146:243a-56: mdo sde'i sde snod 'di lta ste /
T08D4146:243b-2: yang dag par ldan pa'i lung dang /
T08D4146:243b-4: de dag ni mdo sde'i sde snod ces bya'o //
T08D4146:243b-5: mngon pa'i sde snod gang zhe na /
T08D4146:243b-7: dri ba drug dang yang dag par sbyar ba bsdus pa la ni mngon pa'i sde snod ces bya'o //
T08D4146:243b-8: de la 'dul ba'i sde snod gang zhe na /
T08D4146:243b-14: tshe dang ldan pa dag / de dag la ni 'dul ba'i sde snod ces bya'o //
T08D4146:243b-15: 'di dag ni skyes pa'i rabs te /
T08D4146:243b-16: rtogs pa brjod pa'i rabs dang /
T08D4146:243b-17: rang sangs rgyas kyi rabs dang /
T08D4146:243b-18: sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa dang /
T08D4146:243b-19: rang sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa dang /
T08D4146:243b-20: byang chub sems dpas bstan pa dang /
T08D4146:243b-21: nyan thos kyis bstan pa dang /
T08D4146:243b-24: chos nye bar bsdus pa dang /
T08D4146:243b-25: tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig
T08D4146:243b-26: gsung par 'gyur ba yang bklags par gyur pa dang
T08D4146:243b-28: glegs bam du bris par gyur pa dang /
T08D4146:243b-29: chos smra ba la mchod par gyur pa dang /
T08D4146:243b-31: nang pa sangs rgyas pa la mchod par gyur pa dang /
T08D4146:243b-39: glegs bam la kha dog sna tshogs pa'i gos rnams g-yogs shing dkris pa dang /
T08D4146:243b-40: glegs shing mchog byas par gyur pa dang /
T08D4146:243b-41: glegs thag kha dog sna tshogs pas glegs bam bcings
T08D4146:243b-42: par gyur pas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de
T08D4146:243b-43: dag thams cad ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
T08D4146:243b-44: pa byams pa'i gsung rab la mi'i 'thob pa rab
T08D4146:243b-45: tu thob nas dad pas khyim spangs te /
T08D4146:243b-46: skra dang kha spu bregs nas chos gos bgos te
T08D4146:243b-47: khyim nas khyim med par 'dus pa gnyis pa la
T08D4146:243b-49: smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro //
T08D4146:243b-50: tshe dang ldan pa dag de dag ni re zhig
T08D4146:243b-51: chos la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa yin no
T08D4146:243b-52: // 'di ltar 'di dag ni sbyin pa po dang sbyin bdag yin te /
T08D4146:243b-53: dge 'dun la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang /
T08D4146:243b-54: skyed du bcug pa yin te /
T08D4146:244a-1: dge 'dun spyan 'dren pa bsgrags pa dang /
T08D4146:244a-5: rab tu mgron tu 'bod pa dang /
T08D4146:244a-6: dge 'dun la mchod ston gsol ba dang /
T08D4146:244a-8: glo bur du spyan 'dren pa dang /
T08D4146:244a-10: stag res skor byed pa dang /
T08D4146:244a-11: chos sgrogs pa spyan 'dren pa dang /
T08D4146:244a-12: lo lnga ston byed pa dang /
T08D4146:244a-13: gtsug lag khang dbul ba dang /
T08D4146:244a-16: gtsug lag khang gsar pa'i rab gnas byed pa dang /
T08D4146:244a-18: yo byang 'bul bas dge ba'i rtsab bskyed pa de
T08D4146:244a-19: dag thams cad ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
T08D4146:244a-20: pa byams pa'i gsung rab la mi'i 'thob pa rab
T08D4146:244a-21: tu thob nas 'dus pa gsum pa la dad pas
T08D4146:244a-22: khyim spangs te / skra dang kha spu phyi nas chos gos bgos te /
T08D4146:244a-23: yang dag pa'i khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste /
T08D4146:244a-24: smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro //
T08D4146:244a-25: tshe dang ldan pa de dag ni re zhig dge
T08D4146:244a-26: 'dun la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin no
T08D4146:244a-27: // de nas gnas brtan dga' ba'i bshes gnyen gyis rnam par rgya cher bshad nas /
T08D4146:244a-28: shing ta la bdun srid tsam du nam mkha' la
T08D4146:244a-29: 'phags nas dge 'dun de dag gi mdun du cho
T08D4146:244a-30: 'phrul ya ma zung sna tshogs bstan te /
T08D4146:244a-31: steng gi nam mkha' la 'dug nas tshe'i 'du byed dang srog gi 'du byed btang ste /
T08D4146:244a-32: yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
T08D4146:244a-33: de nas dge slong de dag gis gnas brtan dga'
T08D4146:244a-34: ba'i bshes gnyen la lus bsregs nas mchod rten byas
T08D4146:244a-41: pha dan rnams kyis mchod par byas so //
T08D4146:244a-42: rnam pa 'di dag 'phags pa nas 'phags par brgyud nas bshad do//
T08D4146:244a-45: sbyin bdag gang yin pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi
T08D4146:244a-46: gsung rab yun ring du gnas par gyur to snyam
T08D4146:244a-47: nas dga' ba rab tu bskyed pa'i phyir rtogs pa
T08D4146:244a-48: brjod pa 'di 'phags pa dga' ba'i bshes gnyen gyis
T08D4146:244b-0: bshad do // 'phags pa dga' ba'i @244b bshes gnyen
T08D4146:244b-1: gyi rtogs pa brjod ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so
T08D4146:244b-3: / rgya gar gyi mkhan po aa dzi ta shr'i bha dra dang /
